name: Choices (SirDJCat)
description:
PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE DESCRIPTION BEFORE PLAYING!!!

Gameplay
Choices is a story based adventure game where you must make important choices, but the catch is, there are only two choices and they're opposites. The game is short, and should take 5-10 minutes to complete. There are 4 possible endings to get, try to get them all! 

Story

You're offered another job to catch up on your debt, but do you really want to go back to a life of crime?

RATED (By me): T for Violence

How to play

WASD to move

Click to move through dialog and to choose choices

Making the game

This game was made for the TPS Game jam, so I didn't have a lot of time to make it. I originally wanted to do a longer game but time constraints forced me to size it down. For the jam, I was given a week, but due to life stuff, I was only able to work on it for 3 evenings. If there is significant interest, I could work on a longer and more polished version.

Things that were cut

  • Gunfight with Tiger
  • Original Music
  • Drivable getaway car
  • Playable gunfight at the end
  • City traffic and pedestrians
  • Lot's more xD

Thank you for reading! Now you can play 😅, enjoy!
